WE ARE FOOTLOSE RUNNERS

Stop running alone and join us!

Footlose Runners aims to build a running community. We want to make it easier to enjoy your workout while still spending time with your friends.
Are you an experienced runner or a beginner? It does not matter to us.
We run with speakers and throw a party that moves across the streets every week, and everyone is welcome.

Run with us!

Reasons to Run

Part of a
Community

While some runners appreciate the calm and isolation that come with running alone, others view their running time as a chance to socialise. To cultivate a sense of community, it can be very helpful to find a running partner or join a group run. Runners easily share a bond, supporting eachother not only during runs but connect on many levels of their lives. Moreover, maintaining a consistent running partner or group can be an excellent source of motivation for running. Some runners provide advice and motivation to fellow runners through online forums or social media. You can connect with others who are equally passionate about running, find a venue for commemorating your victories, and get assistance in overcoming any challenges you encounter during your training.

Health

You may have guessed it, but it also improves physical and mental health. From decreasing stress levels, boosting self-esteem, strengthens your heart, helps you maintain a healthy weight, improves your memory and your energy levels! So many benefits ... Start small and see yourself building up to your running goals!

Running for a
Specific Goal

If exercising is not your thing, with runnning you can train for a goal. May it be for a particular race, running for a charity, meeting new people, seeing new sites in a city... all are valid goals.

Join our runs

Have we convinced you yet? If not, check out our about section and our list of incredible marathons runs around the world! And if we have -- then head right over to join our runs!
